entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 09:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 97.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:39 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 09:39 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 09:39 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
